sen.e: According to "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan), in the end of June in the year of Mizunoe-Saru (one of the Oriental Zodiac), the Imperial Court of Omi no miya which knew Prince Oama (Emperor Tenmu) raised an army dispatched the envoys to many places and raised the army for its suppression.
